detailsData.title: Experienced Attorney
detailsData.content: More than 25 years of experience handling complex personal injury claims. Board-certified by the Texas Bar in personal injury trial law, an honor earned by only 2% of attorneys in the state.

detailsData.title: Insider Knowledge
detailsData.content: Insider knowledge of insurance companies from former work as a defense attorney. This unique perspective helps in crafting strategies to win cases.

detailsData.title: Personalized Service
detailsData.content: Commitment to one-on-one attention and ongoing communication. Ensures clients are always informed and comfortable with the progress of their case.

detailsData.title: Aggressive Representation
detailsData.content: An aggressive attorney who has the experience and the resources to take on corporate defendants like deep-pocketed insurance companies.

valueProp: At The Seerden Law Firm, we are a small Houston Heights injury law firm that packs a big punch. If you’ve been seriously injured in an accident, you deserve a lawyer who will take the time to talk to you, get to know your case, and walk you through the process. You also need an aggressive attorney who has the experience and the resources to take on corporate defendants like deep-pocketed insurance companies. At The Seerden Law Firm, you get the best of both worlds — the personalized, one-on-one attention that you expect from a small firm, paired with the legal prowess and resources you want from a large law firm. Contact us today to schedule a free consultation. You can expect to discuss your case personally with firm founder Andrew Seerden.
